concept.title: 19.301-3 Rerepresentation by a contractor that represented itself as other than a small business concern.

conbody.p: A contractor that represented itself as other than small before contract award may, but is not required to, rerepresent its size status when-

li.p:
(b)
The contractor qualifies as a small business concern under the applicable size standard in effect at the time of its rerepresentation.
